## BandwidthMonitor class

带宽监控器 负责监控网络带宽使用情况并提供自适应调整

**Signature:**

```text
export declare class BandwidthMonitor extends EventEmitter 
```
**Extends:** [EventEmitter](./ecs-framework-monorepo.eventemitter.md)
